Header: New District Secretary Familiarizes with SFHQ-J Community Roles
Content: The newly-appointed District Secretary for Jaffna, Mr Kanapathipillai Maheshan on Tuesday (18) paid a courtesy call on the Commander, Security Forces - Jaffna, Major General Ruwan Wanigasooriya at his office at the Security Force HQ - Jaffna (SFHQ-J). During the cordial meet, the Commander, Security Forces - Jaffna presented a comprehensive briefing on social welfare and civil community-oriented projects, being spearheaded by Jaffna troops. Several Senior Officers were also present during the occasion.
